text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga litoralis is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Costa Rica.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga litoralis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38303A10109240. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38303A10109240.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
